alert.note: Alert for Coastal Georgetown; Inland Georgetown (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 1:59PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Georgetown County through 230 PM EDT... At 156 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm from near Murrells Inlet to northeast of the city of Georgetown, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is also expected. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, DeBordieu, Murrells Inlet, Graves, Litchfield Beach, Georgetown Memorial Hospital and Waccamaw Community Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, then seek shelter inside a building until the storms have exited the area.
